result.title: Anonymous personalization services - 3rd cycle
result.description: The deliverable will be the outcome of the task T3.2 and will contain the Bloomen related services for the personalization, privacy preserving techniques and identity management over blockchain enabled media delivery platforms. The deliverable is a software prototype and will be accompanied by a small describing report. It will be in iterative form having three iteration cycles. This deliverable corresponds to the third cycle.
